I don't give a fuck about those assholes.

Why, so everyone can think I'm psycho again?

Estás en el territorio de Brighton.

Sorry, I'm late. I got caught up. Work.

how many people can do your job, Dave?

And do you know how many people could do my job?
It means I work too much. It means…
I'm not much of a father. I try, but…

translation.en: [scoffs] Okay, but what… What does this--
And it means that Umbrella needs me. So…

Quiero que te pongan en la lista negra.

I… I'm not gonna call the cops. Okay? And, and, and you know…

translation.en: This… Never mind… This, this whole thing?
Mr. Wesker, this girl was attacked.

-Dad, this is stu-- -Tammy, just shut up.

I think Billie should take tomorrow off and call it a mental health day.

-Those zeros, how many are out there? -[Tate] It changes.
We got over a thousand last summer. Not sure why.

translation.en: but their sense of smell it keeps getting better.

translation.en: -Smart fucking dead folks, huh? -[Jade] They're not dead.
translation.es: - Inteligente. Malditos muertos, ¿no?- No están muertos.

translation.en: The T-virus doesn't kill people, it rewires their brains.

translation.en: All they want to do is eat and spread the virus.
translation.es: Lo único que quieren es comery desparramar el virus.

translation.en: And when the T goes cross-species, it triggers rampant cell growth.

translation.es: Hace que los animales sean grandesy malvados y…

translation.en: Really fucking big and really fucking mean.

I study zeros. Watch how they change, evolve.

[Jade] If we're lucky, it'll get weaker, and the weaker it gets, the smarter,

There's, what, 300 million humans left on this planet?

Son seis mil millones de ellos.

translation.en: So we have to learn how to live with them.

translation.en: AIDS or Ebola or anything else that's trying to wipe out the human race.
translation.es: con el sida, el ébola o cualquier cosaque intente eliminar la raza humana.
Y nosotros los fabricamos. Así que…

translation.en: And, uh, I guess you know about that. You're a survivor.
translation.es: Y supongo que lo sabes.Eres una sobreviviente.

translation.es: Cuando llegó la enfermedad a Glasgow,papá nos embarcó a mí y a mi hermana

translation.en: But you? You were right in the thick of it.
translation.es: ¿Y tú? Justo en medio de todo el caos.

translation.en: It's not easy to talk about, I imagine.
translation.es: No es fácil hablar de eso, me imagino.

translation.en: They've got a bounty on survivors.
Turns out, you're their number one most wanted.
translation.es: Resulta que tú eres la más buscada.

translation.en: You have been granted a three-hour visitor pass.
translation.es: Tienes un pase de visitante de tres horas.

translation.en: So can you come take a seat here for a moment?
Are you going to that thing this weekend?
-[Carl] Yeah, it should be fun. -[Rhonda] Great.
[Carl] And I'm assuming you'll be there, obviously.
[Rhonda] What time are you thinking of making an appearance?
-Actually, could you give me a ride? -[Carl] Sure could…
-Thanks. -[Rhonda] I have your number, so I'll…

- Como quieras.- Sabes que lo haré.

translation.en: And they don't think you're a psycho either.

Así que, por favor, no me odies.

And they say they don't, but they do. PETA gave them an award.

- ¿Y?- Y es un asco y está mal.

And you said, you wanted them not boring, crazy, frog-stealing in my back.

- y hay cámaras.- No hay problema.

[young Billie] The guy was, like, almost crying. [young Jade] Our Dad did that?

translation.es: El tipo que se pone mediaspara ir a la playa,

Now commencing your one hour after-hours pass.

- Siempre.- No lo hago. Solo tengo algo que ellos necesitan.

- ¿Es por dinero?- El dinero no vale nada.

A life. I hand you over, and I get a pass to Umbrella territory.

translation.en: Stay the fuck away from me.
